title: Pinar Toprak – Captain Marvel Composer
body:
Pinar Toprak has been announced as the composer of Captain Marvel, making her the the first woman composer to score a major superhero movie. The film is to be released in March 2019 but considering filming has officially wrapped it’s probably not gonna take long for Toprak to begin her work on the film (if she hasn’t started already).

  But who is she?

  In this post I’ll talk a little about her life and her work, also giving some recommendations from what I think are her best tracks. You can also find the full post here (x).

  The Turkish-American film composer was born in Istanbul in 1980 and studied music at the Istanbul University State Conservatory. Later she moved to Chicago and studied music theory and piano before earning a bachelor’s degree in film scoring at the Berklee College of Music. She also earned another degree at Cal State Northridge in Los Angeles, California. Toprak worked as a music programmer under film composer Hans Zimmer before working on her own, composing scores for movies, TV series and video games.

 She received two International Film Music Critics Association Awards (for her work on the 2009 film The Lightkeepers and the 2011 documentary The Wind Gods) and most recently composed the score for the TV show Krypton while also composing additional music for Justice League. She’s also worked in video game scoring, composing music for the 2006 game Ninety-Nine Nights and the third season of Fortnite.

 After the announcement I did some research and I honestly believe she will do the movie justice. Her music is incredible, it has power, heart and soul, and I can see why she would be hired to compose for not only a superhero movie, but Captain Marvel.

 Here are my favorites from her previous work:

https://youtu.be/qaUqoegX4VU

https://youtu.be/wLpowEukKqI

https://youtu.be/cy3TbuVCXqk

https://youtu.be/WQlnzXww8zI

  I’m way too excited for this movie… First female solo lead in the mcu and first female composer in a major film, YOU GO GIRLS!!

^ I love this interview, Brie is the perfect choice for Carol.

summary: A while ago I started thinking what Billy Batson would be like as an adult, and I had fun realizing he probably dresse like Mr...
body:
A while ago I started thinking what Billy Batson would be like as an adult, and I had fun realizing he probably dresse like Mr Rogers and both Freddy and Mary then proceed to make jokes about Billy looking like a young Mr Rogers.

But then I realized, grown up Billy Batson is a kind, sweet, emotional, reassuring person; he is a young Mr Rogers

summary: THE LIFE OF CAPTAIN MARVEL #4 (OF 5) MARGARET STOHL (W) CARLOS PACHECO (A) Cover by JULIAN TOTINO TEDESCO Variant Cover by JEN...
caption:
THE LIFE OF CAPTAIN MARVEL #4 (OF 5)

MARGARET STOHL (W)
CARLOS PACHECO (A)
Cover by JULIAN TOTINO TEDESCO
Variant Cover by JEN BARTEL
MARVEL BATTLE LINES VARIANT COVER BY YOON LEE
It was an accident of fate. A mysterious bonding between a super hero, a human and an alien machine. Mar-Vell and the Psyche-Magnitron that gave her Kree powers have been part of Carol’s story since the beginning — but that’s just the story you know. The true tale of Carol Danvers and her journey to becoming Captain Marvel begins years ago, on a star-filled night in a sleepy town. A night that no one knew would change the world.
32 PGS./Rated T+ …$3.99

summary: Who Is Captain Marvel? Forty Years After Her Debut, A Female Superhero Takes Flight
title: Who Is Captain Marvel? Forty Years After Her Debut, A Female Superhero Takes Flight
description: Sitting in a sweltering marquee in Avilés, Spain, at July’s Celsius 232 sci-fi festival, Margaret Stohl is telling a packed audience, made up almost entirely of teenage girls, that in comics at least, it’s a great time to be a woman.

reblog.comment: Sitting in a sweltering marquee in Avilés, Spain, at July’s Celsius 232 sci-fi festival, Margaret Stohl is telling a packed audience, made up almost entirely of teenage girls, that in comics at least, it’s a great time to be a woman.

blog.name: philcoulsonismyhero
blog.title: I Believe in Heroes
blog.description:
23-year-old sci-fi nerd from Scotland. 
I read, I write, I watch, I draw, I spend inordinate amounts of time thinking about fandom-type things. And spaceships.
Also, I'm asexual, aromantic, agender, autistic, and of the opinion that everything is better with superheroes.
I've got too many fandoms, but I'm currently really into Voltron, Discworld and Captain Marvel

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.
